{{Wireless embedded system |brand=technicolor |model=LHR01 |series=N600 |fcc_date=12/11/2017 |manuf_country=Thailand |is_manuf=No |type=set top box |fcc_id=G95-LHR01 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM7356;BROADCOM, BCM7356DRKFEBB356, TN1710 P22, W05-01 B3T; |cpu1_cspeed=1.3 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58NVG0S3HBAI4 |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L3254EXDI-10G |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63EFR-TEC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=SATA, USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7600U;MEDIATEK, MT7600UN, 1646-BMAL, ETPBPT76; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=DFS (slave), HDMI out, Component Video/Audio, |802dot11_protocols=abgn }} {{TagLine|DirecTV Integrated Decoder Receiver}} The full model number may be LHR01-C-100, LHR01-O-100, or LHR01-U-100.
<!--{{FCC ST|06/09/2018|indexme.}} --> A 500GB Western Digital WD5000LUCT HDD is pictured in FCC Internal Photos.
